pageProps.title: Applied Language Technology
pageProps.teaser: NLP for newcomers using spaCy and Stanza

data.title: Applied Language Technology
data.slogan: NLP for newcomers using spaCy and Stanza
data.description: These learning materials provide an introduction to applied language technology for audiences who are unfamiliar with language technology and programming. The learning materials assume no previous knowledge of the Python programming language.
data.author: Tuomo Hiippala
